title: Sargent Art Acrylic Paint, Set of 12 Colors pieces of 16 fl oz bottles, Non-Fading, Rich Vivid Pigments, Brilliant Matte Finish, Fast Dry Formula, Non-Toxic
description: Sargent Art Acrylic Paint is a water-based non-toxic paint with assorted colors. Ideal for canvas painting. It glide on smoothly, dries quickly, and long-lasting. Good to use for wood, glass, plastic and more.
